Flow:

2. Convert to user's currency
3. Create Cashfree order
4. Save to database
5. Return checkout URL

Security Layers:
1. Signature verification
2. Timestamp validation
3. Multi-currency amount verification
4. Idempotency check

get.description:
Search academic papers from arXiv with pagination
Cost: 1 credit per 10 papers (per page)
Rate limit: 1 request per second

Returns 10 papers per page. Each page costs 1 credit.
Example: page=1 returns papers 1-10, page=2 returns papers 11-20

Get trending recent papers by topic with pagination
Cost: 1 credit per 10 papers (per page)
Rate limit: 1 request per second

post.description:
Extract and read content from web documents
Cost: 0.25 credits per request
Rate limit: 1 request per second
Search the web for financial and market intelligence
Official Fincept AI Chat

Fetch knowledge articles from Grokipedia (xAI's knowledge base)

This endpoint retrieves comprehensive articles from Grokipedia, covering various topics
with detailed content, references, and citations.

Cost: 0.25 credits per request
Rate limit: 1 request per second

Parameters:
- slug: Article slug/identifier (e.g., "artificial-intelligence", "climate-change")
- extract_refs: Extract and include references (default: true)
- truncate: Limit content to N characters (optional)
- citations: Include citation formatting (default: false)

Example slugs:
- "bitcoin"
- "machine-learning"
- "quantum-computing"
- "financial-markets"

Extract text from uploaded PDF file
Dynamic Pricing:
- 1-10 pages: 1 credit
- 11-50 pages: 2 credits
- 51-100 pages: 3 credits
- 101-200 pages: 5 credits
- 201+ pages: 10 credits
Rate limit: 1 request per second
Max file size: 10MB

get.description: Health check for Fincept research module

post.description:
General-purpose LLM endpoint for running agents, processing data, and AI tasks.

This endpoint allows you to use Fincept API as your LLM provider for:
- Running AI agents
- Data processing and analysis
- Code generation
- Text summarization
- Question answering
- Any other LLM-based tasks

Cost: 5 credits per successful response
Note: Credits are ONLY deducted on successful LLM response. If the LLM fails, no credits are charged.

Rate limit: 1 request per second

Multimodal Visual Analysis using GLM-4.6V for satellite imagery and visual understanding.

This endpoint enables advanced visual analysis capabilities including:
- Satellite image analysis and interpretation
- Geographic feature detection and classification
- Land use and land cover analysis
- Urban planning and infrastructure mapping
- Environmental monitoring
- Agricultural assessment
- Disaster response and damage assessment
- Object detection and counting in images
- Visual question answering
- Image description and captioning

Model: GLM-4.6V (Multimodal Vision-Language Model)
- Native multimodal understanding
- 128K context window
- Advanced visual reasoning
- Function calling capabilities
- High-resolution image processing

Cost: 10 credits per successful response
Note: Credits are ONLY deducted on successful analysis. If the model fails, no credits are charged.

Rate limit: 1 request per second

Example Use Cases:
- "Identify all buildings in this satellite image"
- "What type of land use is shown in this area?"
- "Detect any changes or anomalies in this image"
- "Count the number of vehicles in this parking lot"
- "Analyze the vegetation health in this agricultural field"

Get last known position of a vessel by IMO
Cost: 1 credit per request

Get complete historical location data for a vessel
Cost: 5 credits per request

Get last known positions for multiple vessels (max 50)
Cost: 3 credits per request

Search for all vessels in a defined geographic area
Cost: 2 credits per request

get.description:
Get aircraft data by ID (raw format)
Simple endpoint without authentication for testing

Get raw aircraft data by ID
Simple endpoint without authentication for testing
Health check for Twitter integration module

Get list of all available countries for Twitter trends
No authentication required

Get current Twitter trending topics for a country

Parameters:
- country: Country name (optional, default: "worldwide")
  Examples: "india", "usa", "uk", "japan", "brazil", "france", etc.
  Use /twitter/countries to see all available countries

Cost: 0.5 credits per request
Rate limit: 1 request per 2 seconds

Get user's latest tweets (up to 20 per request)

Parameters:
- username: Twitter screen name (e.g., "elonmusk")
- user_id: Twitter user ID (recommended, more stable than username)
- cursor: Pagination cursor for next page

Note: Either username OR user_id is required. If both provided, user_id takes priority.

Cost: 1.0 credit per request (returns up to 20 tweets)
Rate limit: 1 request per 2 seconds

Returns tweets sorted by created_at with pagination support.

Get tweets by their IDs

Parameters:
- tweet_ids: Comma-separated tweet IDs (e.g., "1846987139428634858,1866332309399781537")

Cost: 0.5 credits per request
Rate limit: 1 request per 2 seconds

Returns tweet data for the specified IDs.

Get replies to a tweet (up to 20 per request)

Parameters:
- tweet_id: The tweet ID to get replies for (required)
- since_time: On or after specified unix timestamp in seconds (optional)
- until_time: Before specified unix timestamp in seconds (optional)
- cursor: Pagination cursor for next page (optional)

Note: tweet_id must be an original tweet (not a reply to another tweet)
      and should be the first tweet in a thread.

Cost: 1.0 credit per request (returns up to 20 replies)
Rate limit: 1 request per 2 seconds

Returns replies sorted by reply time (descending) with pagination support.

Get quote tweets of a tweet (20 quotes per request)

Parameters:
- tweet_id: The tweet ID to get quotes for (required)
- since_time: On or after specified unix timestamp in seconds (optional)
- until_time: Before specified unix timestamp in seconds (optional)
- include_replies: Include replies in results (default: true)
- cursor: Pagination cursor for next page (optional)

Cost: 1.0 credit per request (returns 20 quotes)
Rate limit: 1 request per 2 seconds

Returns quote tweets sorted by quote time (descending) with pagination support.

Get users who retweeted a tweet (~100 users per request)

Parameters:
- tweet_id: The tweet ID to get retweeters for (required)
- cursor: Pagination cursor for next page (optional)

Cost: 1.5 credits per request (returns ~100 users)
Rate limit: 1 request per 2 seconds

Returns users who retweeted the tweet, sorted by retweet time (descending) with pagination support.

Get full article content from a Twitter article tweet

 PREMIUM ENDPOINT - Costs 100 credits per article!

Parameters:
- tweet_id: The tweet ID of the article (required)

Cost: 100 credits per article (PREMIUM)
Rate limit: 1 request per 2 seconds

Returns full article content including title, preview, cover image, and full text.
This is a premium endpoint due to the comprehensive article data provided.

Get the full thread context of a tweet

This endpoint retrieves the entire conversation thread containing the specified tweet.
For example, if a thread has tweets t1 -> t2 -> t3 -> t4, t5, t6 (all replying to t3),
providing t3 will return the entire thread: t1, t2, t3, t4, t5, t6.

Parameters:
- tweet_id: The tweet ID (can be a reply or original tweet)
- cursor: Pagination cursor for next page (optional)

Note: Pagination size varies due to Twitter API limitations.
The number of tweets per page is not fixed.

Cost: 2.0 credits per request (variable tweets per page)
Rate limit: 1 request per 2 seconds

Returns the full thread context with pagination support.

Advanced search for tweets with powerful query syntax

Supports advanced Twitter search operators for precise tweet discovery.

Parameters:
- query: Search query with advanced operators (required)
  Examples:
  - "AI" OR "Twitter" from:elonmusk since:2021-12-31_23:59:59_UTC
  - "#bitcoin" min_faves:100
  - "python" filter:verified
  See: https://github.com/igorbrigadir/twitter-advanced-search

- query_type: "Latest" (chronological) or "Top" (most relevant)
- cursor: Pagination cursor for next page (optional)

Cost: 2.5 credits per request (up to 20 tweets)
Rate limit: 1 request per 2 seconds

Returns search results with pagination support.

Search for Twitter users by keyword

Parameters:
- query: Search keyword (required)
- cursor: Pagination cursor for next page (optional)

Cost: 1.5 credits per request
Rate limit: 1 request per 2 seconds

Returns matching users with pagination support.

Get tweet mentions by user screen name
Each page returns exactly 20 mentions
Order by mention time descending
Cost: 1.0 credit per request
Rate limit: 1 request per 2 seconds
